public abstract class BaseFractal extends javafx.concurrent.Task<ResultImg>
The fractal type.

  • Constructor Details

    • BaseFractal

      public BaseFractal(UnaryOperator<Complex> f, long maxIter, BigInteger radius, ComplexPlane plane, boolean isui)
      a Constructor.
      Parameters:
      f - the function that will be used to construct the fractal.
      maxIter - the maximal number of times that the given function is iterated.
      radius - the radius (which define the divergence) of the fractal.
      plane - the portion of the plane in which the fractal is build.
      isui - true for a graphical version else false.

  • Method Details

    • divergenceIndex

      protected abstract int divergenceIndex(Complex z)
      Calculate the divergence of a number.
      Parameters:
      z - a Complex number (a point on the plane).
      Returns:
      the divergence index of that number.

    • saveResult

      protected void saveResult(int x, int y, float result)
      Save the fractal into a matrix.
      Parameters:
      x - the coordinate on the X-axis.
      y - the coordinate on the Y-axis.
      result - the float associated to that point of the plane.

    • compute

      public ResultImg compute()
      Draw the image.
      Returns:
      the image corresponding to the fractal.

    • call

      protected ResultImg call()
      Lunch the Task.
      Specified by:
      call in class javafx.concurrent.Task<ResultImg>
      Returns:
      the result image.
